[{"word_arabic":"وَنَزَّلْنَا","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":66859,"word_number_in_surah":68,"word_translation":"And We have sent down","word_transliteration":"wanazzalna"},{"word_arabic":"مِنَ","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":66860,"word_number_in_surah":69,"word_translation":"from","word_transliteration":"mina"},{"word_arabic":"السَّمَاءِ","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":66861,"word_number_in_surah":70,"word_translation":"the sky","word_transliteration":"al-samai"},{"word_arabic":"مَاءً","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":66862,"word_number_in_surah":71,"word_translation":"water","word_transliteration":"maan"},{"word_arabic":"مُّبَارَكًا","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":66863,"word_number_in_surah":72,"word_translation":"blessed","word_transliteration":"mubarakan"},{"word_arabic":"فَأَنبَتْنَا","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":66864,"word_number_in_surah":73,"word_translation":"then We made to grow","word_transliteration":"fa-anbatna"},{"word_arabic":"بِهِ","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":66865,"word_number_in_surah":74,"word_translation":"thereby","word_transliteration":"bihi"},{"word_arabic":"جَنَّاتٍ","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":66866,"word_number_in_surah":75,"word_translation":"gardens","word_transliteration":"jannatin"},{"word_arabic":"وَحَبَّ","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":9,"word_number_in_quran":66867,"word_number_in_surah":76,"word_translation":"and grain","word_transliteration":"wahabba"},{"word_arabic":"الْحَصِيدِ","word_ayah":9,"word_number_in_ayah":10,"word_number_in_quran":66868,"word_number_in_surah":77,"word_translation":"(for) the harvest","word_transliteration":"al-hasidi"}]

[{"word_arabic":"رِّزْقًا","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":1,"word_number_in_quran":66874,"word_number_in_surah":83,"word_translation":"A provision","word_transliteration":"riz'qan"},{"word_arabic":"لِّلْعِبَادِ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":2,"word_number_in_quran":66875,"word_number_in_surah":84,"word_translation":"for the slaves","word_transliteration":"lil'ibadi"},{"word_arabic":"وَأَحْيَيْنَا","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":3,"word_number_in_quran":66876,"word_number_in_surah":85,"word_translation":"and We give life","word_transliteration":"wa-ahyayna"},{"word_arabic":"بِهِ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":4,"word_number_in_quran":66877,"word_number_in_surah":86,"word_translation":"therewith","word_transliteration":"bihi"},{"word_arabic":"بَلْدَةً","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":5,"word_number_in_quran":66878,"word_number_in_surah":87,"word_translation":"(to) a land","word_transliteration":"baldatan"},{"word_arabic":"مَّيْتًا","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":6,"word_number_in_quran":66879,"word_number_in_surah":88,"word_translation":"dead","word_transliteration":"maytan"},{"word_arabic":"كَذَلِكَ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":7,"word_number_in_quran":66880,"word_number_in_surah":89,"word_translation":"Thus","word_transliteration":"kadhalika"},{"word_arabic":"الْخُرُوجُ","word_ayah":11,"word_number_in_ayah":8,"word_number_in_quran":66881,"word_number_in_surah":90,"word_translation":"(will be) the coming forth","word_transliteration":"al-khuruju"}]
